verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you are my God. <S%H430><s%> I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> you! <S%H3034><s%> I will praise your name, <S%H8034><s%> for you have done <S%H6213><s%> wonderful <S%H6382><s%> things, <S%H6098><s%> things planned long ago, <S%H7350><s%> in complete faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and truth. <S%H544><s%>

For you have made <S%H7760><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> into a heap, <S%H1530><s%> a fortified <S%H1219><s%> city <S%H7151><s%> into a ruin, <S%H4654><s%> a palace <S%H759><s%> of strangers <S%H2114><s%> to be no city. <S%H5892><s%> It will never <S%H5769><s%> be built. <S%H1129><s%>
Therefore a strong <S%H5794><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> will glorify <S%H3513><s%> you. <S%H7151><s%> A city of awesome <S%H6184><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> will fear you. <S%H3372><s%>

For you have been a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> to the poor, <S%H1800><s%> a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> to the needy <S%H34><s%> in his distress, <S%H6862><s%> a refuge <S%H4268><s%> from the storm, <S%H2230><s%> a shade <S%H6738><s%> from the heat, <S%H2721><s%> when the blast <S%H7307><s%> of the dreaded ones <S%H6184><s%> is like a storm <S%H2230><s%> against the wall. <S%H7023><s%>

As the heat <S%H2721><s%> in a dry place <S%H6724><s%> will you bring down <S%H3665><s%> the noise <S%H7588><s%> of strangers; <S%H2114><s%> as the heat <S%H2721><s%> by the shade <S%H6738><s%> of a cloud, <S%H5645><s%> the song <S%H2159><s%> of the dreaded ones <S%H6184><s%> will be brought low. <S%H6030><s%>

In this mountain, <S%H2022><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> will make <S%H6213><s%> all peoples <S%H5971><s%> a feast <S%H4960><s%> of fat things, <S%H8081><s%> a feast <S%H4960><s%> of choice wines, <S%H8105><s%> of fat things <S%H8081><s%> full of marrow, <S%H4229><s%> of well refined <S%H2212><s%> choice wines. <S%H8105><s%>

He will destroy <S%H1104><s%> in this mountain <S%H2022><s%> the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the covering <S%H3875><s%> that covers <S%H3874><s%> all peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and the veil <S%H4541><s%> that is spread <S%H5259><s%> over all nations. <S%H1471><s%>

He has swallowed up <S%H1104><s%> death <S%H4194><s%> forever! <S%H5331><s%> The Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> will wipe away <S%H4229><s%> tears <S%H1832><s%> from off all faces. <S%H6440><s%> He will take the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from off all the earth, <S%H776><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken it. <S%H1696><s%>

It shall be said <S%H559><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> "Behold, <S%H430><s%> this is our God! We have waited <S%H6960><s%> for him, <S%H3467><s%> and he will save us! <S%H3068><s%> This is Yahweh! We have waited <S%H6960><s%> for him. <S%H1523><s%> We will be glad and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in his salvation! <S%H3444><s%>"

For in this mountain <S%H2022><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will rest. <S%H5117><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> will be trodden down <S%H1758><s%> in his place, <S%H4963><s%> even like straw is trodden down <S%H1758><s%> in the water of the dunghill. <S%H4087><s%>

He will spread out <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> in its midst, <S%H7130><s%> like one who swims <S%H7811><s%> spreads out <S%H6566><s%> hands to swim, <S%H7811><s%> but his pride <S%H1346><s%> will be humbled <S%H8213><s%> together with the craft <S%H698><s%> of his hands. <S%H3027><s%>

He has brought the high <S%H4869><s%> fortress <S%H4013><s%> of your walls <S%H2346><s%> down, <S%H7817><s%> laid low, <S%H8213><s%> and brought <S%H5060><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> even to the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
